common.blogDescription: Discover the latest trends, tips, and best practices in modern web development. From UI components to design systems, stay updated with our expert insights.

hero.heading: Blocks built with Shadcn & Tailwind
hero.description: Finely crafted components built with React, Tailwind and Shadcn UI. Developers can copy and paste these blocks directly into their project.
